entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning early this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 09 February 2023
